## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9b4d07e646a51314cbd80fbeca6a94710d46a4d72598742c1ba79008e84d2822)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pytorch-pygame' @ 0.6.19 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
